title: ICAI Clears New Global Networking Guidelines & Revised Advertising Norms for CA Firms
content:
# ICAI Clears New Global Networking Guidelines & Revised Advertising Norms for CA Firms

Ek important update hai. ICAI (Institute of Chartered Accountants of India) ne Global Networking Guidelines aur Advertising Norms mein significant changes announce kiye hain. Yeh moves CA firms ko globally compete karne aur apni visibility badhane mein madad karenge.

*   **Approval Details:** The ICAI Central Council, apni meeting jo December 10 aur 11, 2025 ko hui thi, usmein "ICAI (Global Networking) Guidelines, 2025" aur Code of Ethics mein amendments ko approve kiya hai.
*   **Global Networking Ka Uddeshya:** Nayi guidelines Indian CA firms, domestic networks, aur registered consultancy entities ko international affiliations formalise karne ka framework dengi. Iska main maqsad large homegrown Indian CA firms banana aur unhein global level par compete karne ke liye enable karna hai.
*   **Advertising Norms Mein Badlav:** Advertising aur website rules ko liberalise kiya gaya hai. Isse firms ko limited, contemporary publicity aur enhanced digital visibility milegi, jo professional visibility badhane mein help karega.
*   **Revised Code of Ethics:** Amended Code of Ethics, jo April 1, 2026 se effective hoga, "management consultancy and other services" ke scope ko bhi badhata hai. Ab ismein forensic accounting, research, social impact, aur AI-related services bhi shamil hongi.
